description: WHATS NEW: 1.2.1 - No new features. Available in Canada. 1.2.0 - 1.Delete large number of bills in a single step. Menu item [Delete Bills] allows user to delete bills that meet criteria - faster than swiping individual bills one at a time.  2. Easier way to mark bills as paid. Use checkbox to mark bills as paid instead of opening each bill and changing status to paid. OVERVIEW: Bills is a complete solution for managing your bills on the Palm Pre and Pixi. You can create an unlimited number of bills and track it. Create comprehensive accounts to associate your bills. Place your bills on the calendar and receive reminders when they are due. Manage recurring bills including calendar reminders. See upcoming recurring bills for the next 30 days. Search for bills. Backup your bills to Google Docs or by email. Set a pin to secure your information.
